mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_약관법령기본 조회 (TrmsSttMapper.getTrmsStt) */ SELECT trms_stt_sn ,trms_stt_cd ,trms_stt_aplcn_day ,trms_stt_end_day ,trms_stt_cn ,atch_file_id ,wrtr_dept_nm ,mdfr_dept_nm ,rgtr_id ,reg_dt ,reg_prgrm_id ,mdfr_id ,mdfcn_dt ,mdfcn_prgrm_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_TRMS_STT" WHERE 1=1 AND trms_stt_cd = #{trmsSttCd}
